div.p: The Adverse Reaction Agent value set includes values that support the recording of agents that may be responsible for causing adverse reactions. It is a broad set encompassing medicinal and non-medicinal agents.

description.value: The Adverse Reaction Agent value set includes values that support the recording of agents that may be responsible for causing adverse reactions. It is a broad set encompassing medicinal and non-medicinal agents.
